div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 169 Euboea, 1963 Burial: after 245 B.C. (Franke) Contents: c. 300 AE Boeotia (as BMC pl. 6, 2, 8, 12; many restruck on AMNG III.2, pl. 34, 8-10) Disposition: Athens 10 Varoucha, A Delt 1964, Chronika, p. 8, illus. P. Franke has list of 178
